title: Bug 104630 - Column icons not displaying when connecting to Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database in the Available Items section, the column icons do not appear.
EB:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Available Items section
2. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon
Expected Result: The table icons and column icons should appear
Actual Result: The column icons are not displayed.
SR:
1. Open the Available Items section
2. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon
3. Observe that the column icons are missing
